name: Re-use
description:
*THE WEB VERSION HAS NO SOUND FOR SOME REASON*

In the future, resources are scarce, so armies use spaceships to collect pieces and use them to make new stuff. There is also a teleportation tecnology that allows them to send the items they craft directly to the battlefield.

In this roguelike space-shooter you alternate between a gathering ship and a frontline battleship, collecting debris and making itens to use in battle. Both ships depend on each other to progress, so it's important to not let any of them be destroyed.
